CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Restricted_Industry__c,'CRB'),False, AND(Do_Not_Call__c = false , Email_Opt_Out__c = false , Out_of_Business__c = false , Benetrac_Indicator__c = false , NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type,'HROi Client')) , NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type,'Oasis Client')) , NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type,'PEO Client')) , NOT(ISPICKVAL(Permanent_Hold_Out_Description__c,'Ecommerce')) , (RecordType.DeveloperName ="CoreAccountRecordType" || RecordType.DeveloperName = "MMSAccountRecordType") , FSA__c = false , (ISBLANK( CPA_Name_Ref__c ) || CPA_Name_Ref__r.Sensitivity_FSA__c = false) , (ISBLANK( Banker_Name_Ref__c) || Banker_Name_Ref__r.Sensitivity_FSA__c = false) , (ISBLANK( Referral_National_Account__c ) || Referral_National_Account__r.Sensitivity_FSA__c = false) , (ISBLANK(Broker_Name_Ref__c ) || Broker_Name_Ref__r.Sensitivity_FSA__c = false) , (ISBLANK( Insurance_Broker_Name_Ref__c) || Insurance_Broker_Name_Ref__r.Sensitivity_BenAdmin__c = false) , NOT(AdvancedPartnerClients__c) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If this box is checked, this prospect is workable for FSA/PBA products. Do Not Call = False Email Opt Out = False non HROi Client Out of Business = False PAYX FSA = False Product Sensitivities = False
CustomField.label: FSA Workable
